q: how dangerous is the activity of skiing
pred: Skiing can be dangerous if not done properly or if the skier is not wearing proper safety gear. In the video, a group of people are seen skiing down a snow-covered slope. Some of them are wearing helmets, while others are not. It is important to wear a helmet to protect the head from potential injuries in case of a fall or collision. Additionally, proper skiing techniques and awareness of the surroundings are crucial to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience. Skiing can be a thrilling and exhilarating activity, but it is essential to prioritize safety and follow the rules and guidelines provided by the ski resort.
